attributes.action: ensure that when a minister is asked to come on The Today Programme, that one is made available - each and everytime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everytime there is an issue in the news that might be a little embarassing or tricky for the Government no one is made available to come and discuss it on the Today Programme. All we get is opposition opinion and journalistic disection. Government should stand up for what it believes in and be seen to do so and not hide behind closed doors until they worked out the spin angle.
